duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide administrative support to the Human Resources Director for general clerical responsibilities.
Maintain all talent program-related documentation and generate reports needed by HRD.
Manage Exempt personnel files and input into the database.
Provide administrative support for specific Human Resources and business-related programs and initiatives.
Assist with event planning and support vendor relationship management.
Maintain HR related bulletin boards, electronic sign messaging, and coordinate various HR activities.
Order supplies and manage budget for supplies.

education_certification.credential: High School Graduate (or equivalent), college preferred
